title: I'm missing magazines, what do I do?
text:
Missed-Issues Policy

A magazine is considered late if not delivered by the Friday following publication.

We offer subscribers the option to extend their subscription by the number of issues missed or to replace those missed issues. To report that a magazine did not arrive within the week of publication, please contact customer support at 800-678-0900.

For subscribers on an alternate delivery plan, please call our MagsExpress line at 1-800-738-3003, or send an email to newyorkmag@MagsExpress.com, and we will mail a replacement copy to you within 48 hours.
